General.Name: Taiwan High Speed Rail Corp
General.Description: Taiwan High Speed Rail Corporation constructs, operates, and manages a high-speed railway system in Taiwan. It operates 350 kilometers length of rail system that links Nangang, Taipei, Banqiao, Taoyuan, Hsinchu, Miaoli, Changhua, Taichung, Yunlin, Chiayi, Tainan, and Zuoying stations. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
